attributes.action: stricter rules for sanctions on benefits. Too many people getting santictioned .
attributes.additional_details: We need tougher rules . We need to make sure that we are all getting the money we are entitled too . People are getting evicted and in debt because universal credit keep giving them sanctions. Yet they say they are giving us the money to live on . So you're taking our food away our shelter away . Our medications away . Our safety away . Just because you're favourite word is sanction and it's wrong . Please please let's do something about this because it's only going to get worse of we don't
attributes.background: It's not fair . We put in so much work and searching to not hear back . Traveling hours on buses to get as you feel no where . Being tired and on our feet for low money . We hardly have money to live but they take away what we get . That money if for us to live on and it's wrong . Stop taking it

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the rules on sanctions to be changed. You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/186470
